info.title: TraDE Middleware API
info.description: This is the API of the TraDE middleware.

get.description:
Gets all available `Network` resources.
Optional query parameter of **limit** determines the limit of returned resources, parameter **name** filters result list by name and parameter **status** filters result list by status of the networks.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of networks to return

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of networks to return

200.description: Returns all `Network` resources based on the provided parameters.

post.summary: Creates and adds a new network to the TraDE middleware

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Network object that needs to be added.

201.description: Successfully created and added a new network

parameters.name: networkId
parameters.description: Id of the network that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns a `Network` resource based on the provided parameters.

parameters.name: networkId
parameters.description: Id of the network that needs to be updated

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Network resource that needs to be updated.

200.description: Successful updated existing network

delete.description: Deletes a complete network from the TraDE middleware

parameters.name: networkId
parameters.description: Id of the network that needs to be fetched

200.description: Successfully deleted existing network

get.description:
Gets all available `Node` resources.
Optional query param of **limit** determines the limit of returned resources, param **name** filters result list by name and param **status** filters result list by status of the nodes.

parameters.name: networkId
parameters.description: Id of the network that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns all `Node` resources based on the provided parameters.

404.description: No nodes found with the specified query parameters

post.summary: Add a new node to the network

parameters.name: networkId
parameters.description: Id of the network that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Node object that needs to be added.

201.description: Successfully created and added a new node

parameters.name: networkId
parameters.description: Id of the network that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns a `Node` resource based on the provided parameters.

parameters.name: networkId
parameters.description: Id of the network that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: node
parameters.description: Node object that needs to be updated.

delete.description: Delete the node from the network

parameters.name: networkId
parameters.description: Id of the network that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node that needs to be deleted

get.description:
Gets all available `DataObject` resources.
Optional query param of **limit** determines the limit of returned resources, param **name** filters result list by name and param **status** filters result list by status of the data objects.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of data objects to return

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of data objects to return

200.description: Returns all `DataObject` resources based on the provided parameters.

post.summary: Creates and adds a new data object to the TraDE middleware

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: DataObject object that needs to be added.

201.description: Successfully created and added a new data object

get.summary: Find a data object by Id

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: Id of the data object that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns a `DataObject` resource based on the provided parameters.

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: Id of the data object that needs to be updated

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Data object resource that needs to be updated.

200.description: successful operation

delete.description: Deletes a complete data object from the TraDE middleware

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: Id of the data object that needs to be fetched

200.description: successful operation

get.summary: Reads data from a data object identified by Id

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: Id of the data object that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: dataElementName
parameters.description: Name of a DataElement

parameters.name: dataElementId
parameters.description: Id of a DataElement

parameters.name: sourceTraDE
parameters.description: URL of a remote TraDE middlware to pull the data object from

200.description: Returns an archive of all data being attached to the data objects' data elements.

post.summary: Pushes the data object identified by Id to the TraDE middleware

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: Id of the data object to write to

parameters.name: dataElement
parameters.description: Name of a data element

parameters.name: targetTraDE
parameters.description: URL of a remote TraDE middleware to push the data object to

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: DataObject object to push.

200.description: Successfully pushed data

get.description:
Gets all available `DataElement` resources.
Optional query param of **limit** determines the limit of returned resources, param **name** filters result list by name and param **status** filters result list by status of the data elements.

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: Id of the data object that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of data elements to return

200.description: Returns all `DataElement` resources based on the provided parameters.

404.description: No data elements found with the specified query parameters

post.summary: Add a new dataElement to the dataObject

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: Id of the data object that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: DataElement object that needs to be added.

201.description: Successfully created and added a new data element

get.summary: Find a data element by Id

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: Id of the data object that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: dataElementId
parameters.description: Id of the data element that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns a `DataElement` resource based on the provided parameters.

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: Id of the data object that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: dataElementId
parameters.description: Id of the data element that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: dataElement
parameters.description: DataElement object that needs to be updated.

delete.description: Delete the data element from the data object

parameters.name: dataObjectId
parameters.description: Id of the data object that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: dataElementId
parameters.description: Id of the data element that needs to be deleted

404.description: Invalid combination of data object and data element Ids

get.description:
Gets all available `DataElement` resources.
Optional query param of **limit** determines the limit of returned resources, param **name** filters result list by name and param **status** filters result list by status of the data elements.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of data elements to return

200.description: Returns all `DataElement` resources based on the provided parameters.

404.description: No data elements found with the specified query parameters

get.summary: Find a data element by Id

parameters.name: dataElementId
parameters.description: Id of the data element that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns a `DataElement` resource based on the provided parameters.

parameters.name: dataElementId
parameters.description: Id of the data element that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: dataElement
parameters.description: DataElement object that needs to be updated.

get.summary: Pulls data from the data value associated to the data element identified by Id

parameters.name: dataElementId
parameters.description: Id of the data element that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: asReference
parameters.description: If the data should be returned directly or a reference to the data value holding the data

200.description: The data attached to the data element

303.description: Redirect to the data value holding the requested data

Location.description: The URL of the data value

post.summary: Pushes data to the TraDE middleware by attaching a new data value holding the provided data to the data element

parameters.name: dataElementId
parameters.description: Id of the data element to attach data to

parameters.name: replyReference
parameters.description: If the data value holding the pushed data or only a reference to it should be returned

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to push.

200.description: Successfully pushed data

303.description: Redirect to the data value holding the pushed data

Location.description: The URL of the data value

get.description:
Gets all available `DataValue` resources.
Optional query param of **limit** determines the limit of returned resources, and param **status** filters result list by status of the data values.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of data values to return

200.description: Returns all `DataValue` resources based on the provided parameters.

post.summary: Creates and adds a new data value to the TraDE middleware

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: DataValue object that needs to be added.

201.description: Successfully created and added a new data value

get.summary: Find a data value by Id

parameters.name: dataValueId
parameters.description: Id of the data value that needs to be fetched

200.description: Returns a `DataValue` resource based on the provided parameters.

parameters.name: dataValueId
parameters.description: Id of the data value that needs to be fetched

parameters.name: dataValue
parameters.description: DataValue object that needs to be updated.

200.description: Returns the updated `DataValue` resource based on the provided modifications.

delete.description: Deletes a data value and its associated data from the TraDE middleware

parameters.name: dataValueId
parameters.description: Id of the data value that needs to be fetched

200.description: Successfully deleted data value

get.summary: Pulls data from the data value identified by Id

parameters.name: dataValueId
parameters.description: Id of the data value that needs to be fetched

200.description: Data attached to data value

post.summary: Pushes data to the TraDE middleware by attaching it to the data value identified by Id

parameters.name: dataValueId
parameters.description: Id of the data value to attach data to

parameters.name: Content-Length
parameters.description: The size of the data passed as header

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to push.

NotFoundResponse.description: The required resource was not found based on the provided query parameters.
